莇字的基本解释

莇
zhù
古书上说的一种草。
古同“助”，殷代的一种租赋制度。

莇字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhù］
［《集韻》牀據切，去御，崇。］
相传商代一种赋税制度。亦写作“助”。

莇字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　莇； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1033第13
【集韻】遲據切，音筯。草名。苟芑也。　又【類篇】音助。商人七十而耡。或作莇。

莇字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
莇字的起名意思

古书上说的一种草。

Nian
Basic explanation of words
Nian
zhù
A kind of grass said in ancient books.
Gutong "assisted", a rent system in the Yin Dynasty.
Nian
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhù］
["Jiyun" bed according to cut, go to imperial, Chong. ]
According to legend, a taxation system in the Shang Dynasty. Also written as "help".
Nian
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Jian Zi] 　莇; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 1033 No. 13
【Ji Yun】Later according to the cut, the sound is 筯. Cursive name. Gou Feng also.　[Classes] Soundsuke. The merchant was seventy and hoe. Or as stubborn.
